name: Union Europeanne des medecins specialiste-Otorhinolaryngology
goal: The UEMS-ORL consists of delegates from all European countries elected by their professional and academic organizations in Otorhinolaryngology (ORL). Representing some 30,000 specialist ORL doctors this organization aims to harmonize and standardize specialist training in ORL, and raise standards to the benefit of patients.
euInitiatives:
Health policies and legislation LN 2005/36/EU
Contribution to NASCE programme concerning rare diseases
